jetx.bet-details: SELECT * FROM settlement WHERE user_id = ? AND operator_id = ? AND lobby_id = ?
jetx.bet-history: SELECT st.lobby_id, st.bet_amount, st.max_mult, st.win_amount, st.created_at, st.status, rs.max_mult as round_max_mult FROM settlement as st INNER JOIN round_stats as rs ON rs.lobby_id = st.lobby_id WHERE st.user_id = ? AND st.operator_id = ? ORDER BY created_at DESC  LIMIT ?
jetx.previous-round-mult: SELECT s.*, rs.max_mult as round_max_mult from settlement s join round_stats rs on s.lobby_id = rs.lobby_id WHERE rs.lobby_id = (SELECT lobby_id from round_stats ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1)

crash.bet-details: SELECT s.user_id as user_id, s.operator_id as operator_id, s.lobby_id as lobby_id, s.bet_amount as bet_amount, s.max_mult as max_mult, s.auto_cashout as auto_cashout, s.created_at as created_at, s.status as plane_status, s.win_amount as win_amount, r.max_mult as round_max_mult FROM settlement AS s left JOIN round_stats AS r ON s.lobby_id = r.lobby_id where  s.user_id = ? and s.operator_id = ? and s.lobby_id = ?
crash.bet-history: SELECT lobby_id, bet_amount, status, max_mult, win_amount, created_at, user_id, avatar  FROM settlement WHERE user_id = ? AND operator_id = ? ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT ?
crash.lobby-details: select lobby_id, client_seeds, max_mult as round_max_mult, server_seed as serverSeed, hash as hashedSeed, created_at from lobbies where lobby_id = ?
crash.previous-round-history: SELECT s.*, rs.max_mult as round_max_mult from settlement s join round_stats rs on s.lobby_id = rs.lobby_id WHERE rs.lobby_id = (SELECT lobby_id from round_stats ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1)

helix.bet-history: SELECT lobby_id, bet_amount, status, max_mult, win_amount, created_at, user_id, avatar  FROM settlement WHERE user_id = ? AND operator_id = ? ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT ?
helix.lobby-details: select lobby_id, client_seeds, max_mult as round_max_mult, server_seed as serverSeed, hash as hashedSeed, created_at from lobbies where lobby_id = ?

airjet.bet-details: SELECT lobby_id, bet_amount, max_mult, auto_cashout, win_amount, status, (select rs.max_mult from round_stats as rs where rs.lobby_id = settlement.lobby_id) as round_max_mult, created_at FROM settlement WHERE user_id = ? AND operator_id = ? ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT ?
